name: I Spent All My Money On A Fancy Gun And Now Only Have One Bullet For The Zombie Apolacypse??
name_original: I Spent All My Money On A Fancy Gun And Now Only Have One Bullet For The Zombie Apolacypse??
description:
I Spent All My Money On A Fancy Gun And Now Only Have One Bullet For The Zombie Apocalypse?? Or SAMMO, for short. Survive the apocalypse

Move Buddy around with W/A/S/D or the arrow keys, and use his fancy gun to shoot some zombies! 

Buddy only has one bullet, so when he takes down a zombie, he has to go get it back!

You can use Sharpeners to make your bullet pierce through multiple zombies!

Toggle your Sharpeners on and off using Right Click!

But be careful not to lose your single bullet...

Get that highscore

SAMMO was made for the ScoreSpace game jam #15, themed around "one bullet". The game was made over the course of the weekend by a team of two (and a half). Almost all assets were created during this time frame! 

Legal stuff down here

Everything we use here was made by us... barring the following:

Font: Cute Notes by Darrell Flood

Environmental sounds: Sourced from Mixkit under their license
